QuoteItem.description: A quote items describe an action to be performed on a productOffering or a product in order to get pricing elements and condition.

action.description: Action to be performed on this quote item (add, modify, remove, etc.)

appointment.description: A reference to appointment(s) associated with this quote item

attachment.description: A reference to attachment(s) associated with this quote item

id.description: Identifier of the quote item (generally it is a sequence number 01, 02, 03, ...)

note.description: Free form text associated with the quote item

quantity.description: Quantity asked for this quote item

quoteItem.description: A structure to embedded quote item within quote item

quoteItemAuthorization.description: Authorization related to this quote item

quoteItemRelationship.description: A relationship from item within a quote

productOfferingQualificationItem.description: A reference to a previously done POQ with item specified

relatedParty.description: A reference to a party playing a role in this quote item

state.description: State of the quote item : described in the state machine diagram
